title: I, Vampire 0-19 (2011-2013) (Complete) [DC]
description:
English | CBR | 20 Issues

I, Vampire #0-19
Publisher:  DC Comics
Publication Date:  September 28, 2011 - April 24, 2013

Writer:  Joshua Hale Fialkov
Pencilers:  Andrea Sorrentino (#0-14, 19), Dennis Calero (#15), Scott Clark (#16), Fernando Blanco (#16-19), Szymon Kudranski (#16)
Inkers:  Andrea Sorrentino (#0-14, 19), Dennis Calero (#15), Scott Clark (#16), Fernando Blanco (#16-19), Szymon Kudranski (#16), Dave Beaty (#16)
Colorist:  Marcelo Maiolo
Letterers:  Pat Brosseau (#0-12), Saida Temfonte (#13), Dezi Sienty (#14), Taylor Esposito (#15-18), and Carlos M. Mangual (#19)
Cover:  Clayton Crain and Andrea Sorrentino (#0), Jenny Frison (#1-5), Andrea Sorrentino and Marcelo Maiolo (#6-9, 14, 17-19), Clayton Crain (#10-13), Guillem March and Tomeu Morey (#15), Alex Garner (#16)

For years, vampire Andrew Bennett kept mankind safe from the horrors of the supernatural world, through a truce he made with his ex-lover Mary. But now that truce has reached a bloody end and Andrew must do everything in his power to stop Mary and her dark forces from going on a killing spree!

Thanks goes to ThosTew, Oracle, Saxon, TheGroup, and ScanDog for this release.
